00035 namespace Crossfade
00036 {
00037         [XmlRoot("mediaDB")]
00038         public sealed class P2PDB_MediaDB
00039         {
00040                 [XmlElement("media")]
00041                 public List<Media> mediaList = new List<Media>();
00042         }
00043 
00044         public sealed class P2PDB
00045         {
00046                 static readonly P2PDB instance = new P2PDB();
00047                 NetService publishService;
00048                 NetServiceBrowser nsBrowser;
00049                 public IPAddress currentIP;
00050 
00051                 static P2PDB()
00052                 {
00053                 }
00054 
00058                 public static P2PDB Instance
00059                 {
00060                         get
00061                         {
00062                                 return instance;
00063                         }
00064                 }
00065 
00066                 P2PDB()
00067                 {
00068                         nsBrowser = new NetServiceBrowser();
00069                 }
00070 
00074                 public Media[] query(IPAddress ip, Query q)
00075                 {
00076                         try
00077                         {
00078                                 if (q == null)
00079                                 {
00080                                         P2PDB_MediaDB mdb;
00081 
00082                                         Uri uri = new Uri("http://" + ip.ToString() + ":21000/crossfade.xml");
00083                                         HttpWebRequest request = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(uri);
00084                                         HttpWebResponse response = (HttpWebResponse)request.GetResponse();
00085 
00086                                         Stream sr = response.GetResponseStream();
00087                                         mdb = (P2PDB_MediaDB)(new XmlSerializer(typeof(P2PDB_MediaDB)).Deserialize(sr));
00088                                         sr.Close();
00089 
00090                                         List<Media> newList = new List<Media>();
00091 
00092                                         foreach (Media m in mdb.mediaList)
00093                                         {
00094                                                 if (m.uri.Scheme != Uri.UriSchemeFile) continue;
00095                                                 if (m.SHA1Sum == null) continue;
00096 
00097                                                 m.uri = new Uri("http://" + ip.ToString() + ":21000/" + m.SHA1Sum);
00098                                                 newList.Add(m);
00099                                         }
00100 
00101                                         return newList.ToArray();
00102                                 }
00103                                 else
00104                                 {
00105                                         return null;
00106                                 }
00107                         }
00108                         catch (WebException)
00109                         {
00110                                 return null;
00111                         }
00112                         catch (SocketException)
00113                         {
00114                                 return null;
00115                         }
00116                 }
00117 
00118                 NetService resolving = null;
00119 
00123                 public void Resolve(NetService resolve)
00124                 {
00125                         if (resolving != null)
00126                         {
00127                                 resolving.Stop();
00128                         }
00129 
00130                         resolve.DidResolveService += new NetService.ServiceResolved(Program.gui.p2p_DidResolveService);
00131                         resolve.ResolveWithTimeout(10);
00132                 }
00133 
00137                 public void start()
00138                 {
00139                         if (Program.gui is ISynchronizeInvoke)
00140                         {
00141                                 try
00142                                 {
00143                                         publishService = new NetService("", "_crossfade._tcp", System.Environment.MachineName, 21000);
00144                                         publishService.Publish();
00145 
00146                                         nsBrowser.InvokeableObject = (ISynchronizeInvoke)Program.gui;
00147                                         nsBrowser.DidFindService += new NetServiceBrowser.ServiceFound(Program.gui.p2p_DidFindService);
00148                                         nsBrowser.DidRemoveService += new NetServiceBrowser.ServiceRemoved(Program.gui.p2p_DidRemoveService);
00149                                         nsBrowser.SearchForService("_crossfade._tcp", "");
00150                                 }
00151                                 catch (DNSServiceException e)
00152                                 {
00153                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print(String.Format("A DNSServiceException occured: {0}", e.Message));
00154                                         return;
00155                                 }
00156                                 catch (Exception e)
00157                                 {
00158                                         System.Diagnostics.Debug.Print(String.Format("An exception occured: {0}", e.Message));
00159                                         return;
00160                                 }
00161                         }
00162                 }
00163 
00167                 public void stop()
00168                 {
00169                         nsBrowser.Stop();
00170                         publishService.Stop();
00171                 }
00172         }
00173 }
